title: Strucmotif Query File Parameters

file.description: File content converted to a Base64 string.

gzipped.description: True if the content of the 'file' property is compressed by the GZIP algorithm (before being Base64-encoded).

residue_ids.description: Provides the set of residue identifiers that define the query. Can be empty if the submitted file property contains an extracted motif.

description: Base64-encoded file can be uploaded together with the provided file_format (cif, bcif).
